entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023
